game.name: Toot And Otto
game.history: Toot and Otto is a game similar to Connect 4 made by ThinkFun.
game.board: The standard Toot and Otto board is 6x4, and the version in the games database can grow up to a 7x7 board. Starting position: Nothing on the board. Each player chooses a name (either "Toot" or "Otto").
game.pieces: There are two pieces in Toot and Otto - the T and the O. Each player has a limited number of each letter.
game.tomove: Each player takes turns making one valid move. Valid Moves: On your turn, place a piece down one of the columns. A piece cannot be played on a column that is full (all its rows are filled).
game.towin: Be the first player to get your name, either "TOOT" or "OTTO" depending on which player you are, spelled on the board vertically, horizontally, or diagonally.
game.rules: Toot goes first and players alternate making legal moves.

variant.name: Misere
variant.description: Force the opponent to spell his or her name. A player loses if his or her name is spelled.
